field.name: TRRD
field.description: Defines the DRAM activate-to-activate delay for different banks (TRRD) in cycles

field.name: TRC
field.description: Defines the DRAM period between active commands for the same bank (TRC) in cycles

field.name: TRP
field.description: Defines the DRAM precharge command time (TRP) in cycles

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Read commands cannot interrupt write commands

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Read commands can interrupt write commands

field.name: TDAL
field.description: Defines the auto-precharge write recovery time when auto-precharge is enabled (CR01[AP] is set), in cycles. This is defined internally as t RP (pre-charge time) + auto-precharge write recovery time. Not all memories use this parameter. If t DAL is defined in the memory specification, then program this parameter to the specified value. If the memory does not specify a t DAL time, then program this parameter to t WR + t RP . Do not program this parameter with a value of 0x0. Else, the memory controller does not function properly when auto-precharge is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Issue only REF and PRE commands during DLL initialization of the DRAM devices. If PRE commands are issued before DLL initialization is complete, the command is executed immediately and the DLL initialization continues

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Do not issue any type of command during DLL initialization of the DRAM devices. If any other commands are issued, they are held until DLL initialization completes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b001
enumeratedValue.description: Two memory words - only applicable if the reduc parameter is set to 'b0 for operation in full datapath mode. Applicable for these memory systems: DDR1 (dram_class = 'b0000) LPDDR1 (dram_class = 'b0001)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b010
enumeratedValue.description: Four memory words. Applicable for these memory systems: DDR1 (dram_class = 'b0000) LPDDR1 (dram_class = 'b0001) DDR2 (dram_class = 'b0100)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: Eight memory words. Applicable for these memory systems: DDR1 (dram_class = 'b0000) LPDDR1 (dram_class = 'b0001)

field.name: TCPD
field.description: Time Clock Enable to Precharge Delay

field.name: TREFEN
field.description: Enables refresh commands. If command refresh mode is configured, then refresh commands are automatically issued based on the internal CR31[TREF] counter and any refresh commands sent through the command interface or the register interface. 0 Refresh commands disabled 1 Refresh commands enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The memory controller completes processing of the current burst for the current transaction (if any), issues a precharge all command, and disables the clock enable signal to the DRAM devices. Any subsequent commands in the command queue are suspended until this bit is cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt memory initialization and enter self-refresh mode

field.name: CKSRE
field.description: Clock hold delay on self refresh entry. Sets the number of cycles to hold the clock stable after entering self-refresh mode. The clock will run for a minimum of cksre cycles after CLK falls

field.name: MR0DAT0
field.description: Data to program into memory mode register 0 for chip select

field.name: MR1DAT0
field.description: Data to program into memory mode register 1 for chip select

field.name: MR2DATA0
field.description: Data to program into memory mode register 2 for chip select

field.name: MR3DAT0
field.description: Data to program into memory mode register 3 for chip select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disabled. The command queue is a straight FIFO

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enabled. The command queue is filled according to the placement logic factors

field.name: REDUC
field.description: Controls the width of the memory datapath. The entire user datapath is used regardless of this setting. When operating in half datapath mode, only burst length value of 4 and 8 are supported

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: 16-bit - standard operation using full memory bus

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: 8-bit - Memory datapath width is half of the maximum size. The upper half of the memory busses (DQ, DQS, and DM) are unused and relevant data only exists in the lower half of the busses

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The memory controller issues a write command to the DRAM devices when it has received enough data for one DRAM burst. Write data can be sent in any cycle relative to the write command. This mode also allows for multi-word write command data to arrive in non-sequential cycles

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The memory controller issues a write command to the DRAM devices after the first word of the write data is received by the memory controller. The first word can be sent at any time relative to the write command. In this mode, multi-word write command data must be available to the memory controller in sequential cycles

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Clear the corresponding bit in INTSTATUS

field.name: R2WSMCS
field.description: Read To Write Same Chip Select

field.name: W2RSMCS
field.description: Write To Read Same Chip Select

field.name: PDNCS
field.description: OCD Pull Down adjustment Chip Select

field.name: PUPCS
field.description: OCD Pull Up adjustment Chip Select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Port 0 and port 1 are treated independently for arbitration

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Port 0 and port 1 are grouped together for arbitration

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Highest listing in the scan order

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Lowest listing in the scan order

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Highest listing in the scan order

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Lowest listing in the scan order

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Highest listing in the scan order

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Lowest listing in the scan order

field.name: CLKDISCS
field.description: DRAM Clock Disable for chip select

field.name: SPARE_DLY_CTRL
field.description: These SPARE_DLY_CTRL[3:0]bits set the delay chains in the spare logic

field.name: PAD_ODT_CS0
field.description: Required to enable ODT and configure ODT resistor value in the pad
